channel.title: The Big Dog Sports Show's Podcast
channel.description: The BDS show produces sports and life talk with comedy, and forceful opinions. Plus in-between the high-energy talk, we take you on a trip down hip-hop memory lane with some of the best rap and r-n-b from the 70’s, 80’s, and 90’s!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Old School Rulz and Sportsalicious News
channel.itunes:author: E Bang
channel.itunes:summary: The BDS show produces sports and life talk with comedy, and forceful opinions. Plus in-between the high-energy talk, we take you on a trip down hip-hop memory lane with some of the best rap and r-n-b from the 70’s, 80’s, and 90’s!

item.title: The Big Dog Sports Show Episode 48 Part 1
item.description: Episode 48 finds Da Commish solo once again, but as my kinfolks would say, "one monkey don't stop the show". This show we explore the biggest questions in college and pro football, including the BCS match-ups; both my college and pro Terrific 12's; cheating in college sports; my Dallas Cowboys; Favre; Cliff Lee; amongst other items. And why you are sitting back contemplating straight knowledge, I hit ya with some of the best old school hip hop and RnB! This week we pay homage to Dallas rap in the late 80's and early 90's, specifically West Dallas' own The D.O.C., Oak Cliff's Nemesis, and South Side's (by the way of Cali) Ron C...the real Ron C, not the fake on! So sit on back and enjoy The Big Dog Sports show episode 48! Da Commish Part 1 Show Intro Music: South Dallas Drop/It's Funky Enough/Oak Cliff/Dope Man/Trendsetter
item.dc:creator: E Bang
item.itunes:summary:
Episode 48 finds Da Commish solo once again, but as my kinfolks would say, "one monkey don't stop the show". This show we explore the biggest questions in college and pro football, including the BCS match-ups; both my college and pro Terrific 12's; cheating in college sports; my Dallas Cowboys; Favre; Cliff Lee; amongst other items. And why you are sitting back contemplating straight knowledge, I hit ya with some of the best old school hip hop and RnB! This week we pay homage to Dallas rap in the late 80's and early 90's, specifically West Dallas' own The D.O.C., Oak Cliff's Nemesis, and South Side's (by the way of Cali) Ron C...the real Ron C, not the fake on! So sit on back and enjoy The Big Dog Sports show episode 48! Da Commish
